Name: Blood Edge
Description: Sword that thirst blood. Needs to be used carefully.

Name: Iron Sword
Description: Sword made out of Iron. It is known for it's heavy weight.

Name: Sharktooth Blade
Description: Blade made from shark tooth. It has very pointy edges.

Name: Magnetic Pulse
Description: Weapon made with Magenetic engery. It can produce magnetic discharge against objects.
